description: An exponential function on partitions (next term is 2^512).
comments: Largest number that can be expressed in the form a_1 ^ a_2 ^ ... ^a_k, where a_1 + a_2 + ... + a_k = n. [From _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Apr 09 2010]
references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: For n >= 7, a(n) = 2^a(n-2). [From _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Apr 09 2010]
crossrefs: Cf. A000792, A014221. [From _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Apr 09 2010]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
